# NSDataAssetName

**Type Alias**

The name of a data asset.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias NSDataAssetName = String
```

## Getting data asset information

- **name**: The name of the data set in the asset catalog.
- **typeIdentifier**: The uniform type identifier for the data asset.

items.description: The name of the data set in the asset catalog.
items.name: name

items.description: The uniform type identifier for the data asset.
items.name: typeIdentifier
